entry.title: Affairs and Letters
entry.summary:
Author: ToTheStars8

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,376Chapters: 25/?Kudos: 673

Summary: Secure in your position in the Kent household you are more than happy in your station in life. Yet, when the Wayne family enters the town, you are entranced by the second eldest son, Mr. Jason Todd. Between keeping your reputation intact as a polite young lady and dabbling into the follies of love, you’re caught in a scandalous affair that threatens the very thing you are trying to protect.Regency AU!

entry.title: A Firecracker With Child
entry.summary:
Author: thebatdadnomad (aylooktaekook)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,292Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 49

Summary: Jason had decided, right as you started the engine and pulled out, that he would approach you how he approached every case, with spirit and the fervour of a man better than your deadbeat ex. He would prove that he wanted your fire no matter how hot, that wasn't a flighty Romeo and would be there for you in any circumstance. He had to. Not for his sake, but for yours. Or, the fact that you, a gorgeous woman growing an entire baby human in your body, was out doing your own groceries was unacceptable. Fucking Gotham.

entry.title: This is Me Trying
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,925Chapters: 9/9Kudos: 339

Summary: "Jay's here tonight. I could introduce them.” Dick mumbles with a smile and you notice him burying his face into the side of your friend's hair. Ugh.“Jason?” A younger voice pipes up, you turn your head to take in the newcomers. “If you hate your friend you could just say that, there is no need for torture.” Dick laughs before introducing his younger brother, Damian.OrThe time your friend drags you to a street race and you meet her ridiculously good looking boyfriend and his intimidating brothers.

entry.title: Burning House
entry.summary:
Author: Yes_I_have_daddy_issues

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,879Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 44

Summary: We were kids together, growing up in the same crime ridden alleyways and neighborhoods, just two doors down the road from each other. “I’ll find a way.” he turned back to face me, a big smile stretching across his face, one I would never forget, the light in his eyes visible.I never saw Jason again after that night. Not in person at least.On the news, getting adopted by Bruce Wayne of all people, waving and smiling to the cameras, it never reached his eyes the way his smile always did when we were younger.Then he vanished for good.

entry.title: Strawberry Waffles
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,695Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 62

Summary: “Like a date?” You ask in a near whisper. Jason looks like he's been electrocuted but slowly he nods his head twice. “Yeah. A date. You and me, the school dance.” Oh. Your heart feels like it's beating so fast it's going to stop at any second. But you nod, your face warm, and there's no way you can stop yourself from smiling now. “Um, y- yeah.” You stammer before clearing your throat softly. “Yes.” You say, more confident in your answer. “Yes, I would.. love to go with you. On a date. To the dance.” Or Jason Todd becomes a girl dad after dying and coming back to life
